Text.Page:
The Kazuur Syndicate—a gula outfit, so imagine crazy cannibals—sold some slaves to Dirken.

Now wouldn't it be interesting if word got around that dealing with Dirken could be lethal? Nothing diminishes profits like your own death, if you know what I mean.

Go to the northern part of Desolate Coast and wipe out the {@LinkCreature:12#7#gula brawlers}. Word will get around.

We're the next dream team, . I set 'em up, you knock 'em down.

Hmmm. Just saying that makes me thirsty...
